description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Oh no! Robots have invaded the zoo! Join forces as Bupper the seal, Froofy the tortoise, Clavis the toad and Cheekeze the penguin to take back the zoo in this fun filled retro style platformer game. Use different types of bubble gum and special items to battle your way through all of the 100 levels as you and your friends work together to defeat the many different kinds of robot enemies.
